mgrinder.title: Manure Grinder Recipe
mgrinder.text: Dear @,^This is a blueprint for a grinder that will help you get the best of the manure produced by your bulls, it can grind higher quality manure so you can use just the perfect amount in your mixers to prepare your fertilizers.^Hope you find it usefull.^-Marnie
fmixer.title: Fertilizer Mixer Recipe
fmixer.text: Dear @,^This is the blueprint for the fertilizer mixer, you can mix manure with sap, oak resign, pine tar or fiber to produce a large amount of fertilizers! I'm sure you'll put it to good use!^-Marnie
